Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic is available to play today after being listed as 'questionable' for the Dallas Mavericks' game against the Denver Nuggets on Sunday.
Doncic has appeared in all nine of the Mavericks' games this season and led the team in their recent matchup against the Phoenix Suns.

Luka Doncic vs. Denver Nuggets: Reflecting on Luka Doncic's career performance against the Denver Nuggets, the Slovenian star has consistently posted impressive numbers against his Western Conference rivals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will tip off at 8:00 p.m. EDT (5 p.m. PT) at the Ball Arena in Denver, Colorado.
The live streaming of the game will be available on the NBA League Pass and Fubo TV app and website (regional restrictions may apply).
Luka Doncic is currently averaging 28.8 points, 8.0 rebounds and 8.0 assists per game over nine games, shooting 40.7% from the field, including 34.1% from beyond the arc.
Others: The Dallas Mavericks vs. Denver Nuggets game is scheduled to take place on Sunday, Nov. 10.
Doncic scored with impressive efficiency, shooting 48.0% from the field, including 50.0% from beyond the arc, last season against the Nuggets.

Luka Doncic's career performance against the Denver Nuggets: Over 18 games, Doncic has averaged 27.3 points, 8.3 rebounds and 9.7 assists per game, shooting 44.0% from the field, including 32.9% from three-point range.
